definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: In the Einsteinian universe, time is not absolute.
sentences.chinese: 在爱因斯坦宇宙中，时间没有绝对值。

sentences.english: Output line voltage of the error of the absolute value of less than 1% to the indicator.
sentences.chinese: 输出线电压的误差绝对值小于1%，达到指标要求。

sentences.english: Distance to x-axis is absolute value of y.
sentences.chinese: 到x轴的距离是y的绝对值。

sentences.english: The absolute value of barometric coefficient is biggest when the level of solar activities is highest.
sentences.chinese: 太阳活动最高的年，气压修正系数的绝对值最大。

sentences.english: This number always increases, and most likely its absolute value is not useful.
sentences.chinese: 该数字始终在增加，并且其绝对值几乎没有用处。

sentences.english: Base period level high, the rate of rise is noffast, but increases the absolute value is very big.
sentences.chinese: 基期水平高，增长速度不快，但增加的绝对值很大。

sentences.english: Well, what is this distance? It is just y,or maybe absolute value of y.
sentences.chinese: 这里的距离是什么？是y，准确地说是y的绝对值。

sentences.english: In this paper, the absolute value problem is disscussed by basic property of absolute value.
sentences.chinese: 利用绝对值基本关系式解决有关绝对值问题。

sentences.english: In this paper, the absolute value problem is disscussed by basic property of absolute value.
sentences.chinese: 利用绝对值基本关系式解决有关绝对值问题。

sentences.english: It's given by, actually, the absolute value of this guy.
sentences.chinese: 其实它是通过这个东西的绝对值得到的。

sentences.english: The positive instantaneous flow signal were transmited by absolute value circuit.
sentences.chinese: 用绝对值电路输出正极性瞬时流量信号。

sentences.english: So these vectors, they have the same length.
sentences.chinese: 因此这些向量，有着相同绝对值。
